# Name: # Note: if you have increased the bootloader size
Type: make sure to update the offsets to avoid overlap

# Name: # ESP-IDF Partition Table for 16MB Flash with Secure Boot/Signing support.
# Increased offsets for Bootloader safety (up to 64KB boundary) and 4MB App sizes.
# 预留给 Bootloader (从 0x1000 开始，Bootloader size < 64KB)
# Partition Table 从 0x10000 开始，为 Bootloader 留足了空间。
# NVS (Non-Volatile Storage): 存储 Wi-Fi 配置
# OTADATA: 存储下一次启动加载哪个 App 分区的标记
# PHY_INIT: Wi-Fi PHY 校准数据
# FACTORY: 初始/备份应用程序 (4MB)
